seo_title: Take Your 2018 Spring Break in San Francisco
meta_description: Take Your 2018 Spring Break in SF
short_description: Spring! It’s not quite here yet, but you can feel the anticipation in the air, especially if you live in a colder part of the country. We’re here to help.
long_description:
Spring! It’s not quite here yet, but you can feel the anticipation in the air, especially if you live in a colder part of the country. Perhaps cabin fever has set in, you’ve exhausted your Netflix list, and you’re scratching at the walls, yearning to break free from the boredom and monotony.

We’re here to help.

Literally, we’re right here in San Francisco, and that’s about all the help you need. What are you waiting for?

From March until May is one of the best times to visit — the weather is mild and you’ll beat the tourist rush. Average high temperatures are in the mid-60s.

Here at Stanford Court, you can simply walk out the door and explore the Nob Hill neighborhood.

You can also #LayDownSomeTracks visiting some of San Francisco’s best neighborhoods. Explore the art-friendly Mission District. Take a stroll through the oldest and largest Chinatown in North America or through North Beach, home to San Francisco’s Little Italy.

And then there’s the food, with plenty of new tastes and great coffee to rouse you from your winter malaise.

Spring Break Specials at Stanford Court

We’ve got some great amenities and specials to make your 2018 spring break even more fun:

Advance Purchase Rate — Save up to 15% off our best available rate when you book at least 15 days in advance.

Bed and Breakfast Package Rate — Get up to two breakfast buffet vouchers per room per day to be used in Aurea Café.

Night Owl Special —  Check in after 8 pm and enjoy a $30 voucher for use at Aurea Café and Lounge for drinks or breakfast the next morning
